titles.title: CARS Act of 2008
Commuter Aid and Relief for Suburbs Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide individuals a deduction for commuting expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
4/24/2008--Introduced.
Commuter Aid and Relief for Suburbs Act of 2008 or the CARS Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers a tax deduction for a specified percentage of the cost of commuting between their residence and place of employment.
